text: ARD-Infonacht (German for ARD-Newsnight) is Germany's only overnight all-news radio show. It broadcasts daily from NDR Info in Hamburg between 22:00 and 6:00. It started broadcasting on 1 April 2011 on MDR. It is carried by several all-news stations: BR24, hr-Info, SWR Aktuell, Inforadio, MDR Aktuell, WDR5 and Antenne Saar. The program's format consists of traffic and weather reports every 30 minutes and round-the-clock news from ARD worldwide correspondents. The actual transfer time of each station is different, including: * Inforadio: daily from 23:00 to 6:00. * BR24: daily from 0:00 to 6:00. * WDR5, MDR Aktuell, hr-Info and Antenne Saar: daily from 23:00 to 6:00. * SWR Aktuell: weekdays from 23:00 to 6:00 (weekends are until 8:00). Category:Radio programs Category:Entertainment in Germany
title: ARD-Infonacht
